c74object.name: dada.music~
c74object.description: Browse all music (if you are prepared to wait long enough...)

method.name: autozoom
method.description: Adapts view and zoom automatically according to the current buffer positions (only for buffer wheel type).

method.name: cursor
method.description:
A cursor message will set the play cursor on a specific position on the timeline.
If a float is given as argument, then it is assumed to be a 0-1 position on the timeline.
If two arguments are given, they arelength_in_samps and phase; in this case, the specific buffer having length_in_samps samples and with position phase is targeted. If phase is an integer, then it is expected to be the relative index of the buffer inside all the buffers of length length_in_samps; if it is a float, it is expected to be a coordinate between 0. and 1.
If the syntax is cursor length_in_samps partial_coord partial_coord partial_coord... where partial_coord are hexadecimal symbols (and not integers!), then the buffer with the specified id (if any) is selected.
If the syntax is cursor buffername where buffername is a symbol referring to a buffer, then the cursor is set exactly on the localization of the buffer on the line (up to the current bitdepth),

method.name: set
method.description: Sets the name a buffer (if any) that will contain the current played buffer at any time.

method.name: setcursor
method.description: A setcursor message works like a cursor message, except that it will not synchronize the linked buffer (see set message), nor the buffer will be output (see outputbuffer attribute). See cursor to know more.

method.name: zoomby
zoomexp
method.description: A zoomexp message, followed by a floating point number N, will exponentially increase or decrease the zoom by the exponent N. By default, the zooming happens around the domain center; if an additional "cursor" symbol is given, the zooming happens around the play cursor; if instead of the "cursor" symbol a floating point number is given, the zooming happens around the specified coordinate.

attribute.name: bitdepth
attribute.description: Sets the bit depth (only 4, 8 and 16 allowed).

attribute.name: hiprec
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to increase precision when zooming in. Beware: might slow things down enormously!

attribute.name: outputbuffer
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to output buffers as lllls from the middle outlet

attribute.name: playinterval
attribute.description: Sets the interval between different pieces in milliseconds.
